snippet: Nearly 17 million chickens and turkeys in the state are dead, dying or scheduled to be killed because of the disease.
abstract: Iowa Gov Terry Branstad declares state of emergency as bird flu continues to spread around state; nearly 17 million chickens and turkeys in the state are dead, dying or scheduled to be killed because of the disease.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 17 million chickens and turkeys in the state are dead, dying or scheduled to be killed because of the disease.

headline.main: Iowa Declares Emergency as Bird Flu Spreads
headline.print_headline: Iowa Declares Emergency as Bird Flu Spreads
